sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.USERID, T1.USERNAME FROM sy_usermst T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.USEYN = 'Y' AND T1.USERGUBUN = #USERGUBUN#
AND T1.USERNAME LIKE '%$USERNAME$%'
ORDER BY T1.USERID ASC

SELECT T1.SYSID, (SELECT SYSNAME FROM sy_sysmst WHERE SYSID = T1.SYSID) AS SYSNAME, T1.MENUID, (SELECT MENUNAME FROM sy_menutb WHERE SYSID = T1.SYSID AND MENUID = T1.MENUID) AS MENUNAME, T1.PGMID, T1.PGMNAME, IFNULL(T2.AUTH_S, 'N') AS AUTH_S, IFNULL(T2.AUTH_I, 'N') AS AUTH_I, IFNULL(T2.AUTH_U, 'N') AS AUTH_U, IFNULL(T2.AUTH_D, 'N') AS AUTH_D, IFNULL(T2.AUTH_P, 'N') AS AUTH_P FROM sy_menupgmtb T1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT SYSID, MENUID, PGMID, AUTH_S, AUTH_I, AUTH_U, AUTH_D, AUTH_P FROM sy_userpgmauthtb WHERE USERID = #USERID#) T2 ON T1.SYSID = T2.SYSID AND T1.MENUID = T2.MENUID AND T1.PGMID = T2.PGMID WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.SYSID IS NOT NULL AND T2.MENUID IS NOT NULL
AND T1.SYSID = #SYSID#
AND T1.MENUID = #MENUID#
ORDER BY T1.PGMID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SY_USERPGMAUTHTB SET AUTH_S = #AUTH_S#, AUTH_S = #AUTH_I#, AUTH_S = #AUTH_U#, AUTH_S = #AUTH_D#, AUTH_S = #AUTH_P#, UPDATEUSER = #UPDATEUSER#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE USERID = #USERID# AND SYSID = #SYSID# AND MENUID = #MENUID# AND PGMID = #PGMID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SY_USERPGMAUTHTB ( USERID, PGMID, SYSID, MENUID, AUTH_S, AUTH_I, AUTH_U, AUTH_D, AUTH_P, INSERTUSER, INSERTDATE ) VALUES( #USERID#, #PGMID#, #SYSID#, #MENUID#, #AUTH_S#, #AUTH_I#, #AUTH_U#, #AUTH_D#, #AUTH_P#, #INSERTUSER#, SYSDATE() )
